entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
